page.title: 04HACKLINGE AREA EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Most employment is at Betteshanger Coal Mine. Farm work accounts for a fair percentage. A number of people go to shops, offices and factories in Deal and Sandwich and ferry services and docks in Dover snd Folkestone. The mine employs 700 persons (90% of them men).Model Flight Accessories employs 16 people and Worth Packers also employ 16. A nursery growing plants employs 14 and a tractor repair firm 10. A garage with filling station does motor repairs and employs 3 men and a small shop employs 2 people. Three Public Houses employ part-timers Two men are unemployed due to redund- ancy at the mine. About 50% of women work, some part-time. There is also a filling station and a Transport Cafe at Hacklinge.
